subDescription:
X-Baby T6-Smok V8 Vape Coils

The Smok V8 X Baby T6 Coils are designed for use with the Smok V8 TFV8 X Baby vape tank. Due to the sub ohm resistance coil, these coils perform best with high VG eliquids of 70% and above.

Smok V8 X Baby T6 Coils Features:

  • Smok sub ohm coils
  • Used between 40 - 130W
  • Compatible with high VG e-liquids
Featuring a sextuple coil build as well as a Stainless Steel construction, allowing for a longer lifespan as well as being compatible with Temperature Control mode and Variable Wattage mode. Smok coils recommended to be powered between 40-130 watts. 0.2 Ohm coils designed slightly differently to the coils in the Baby. Big Baby range, the X-Baby coils are unfortunately not cross-compatible with the other tanks and can only be used in the X-Baby. Contains:
  • 3 x Smok X-Baby T6 0.2 Ohm Vape Coils
Important information about Sub Ohm Vaping: Coil registers below 1.0 Ohm called as a sub ohm coil. Recommended for advanced vapers only. Smok Coils require more power to use properly, which will be provided by an advanced vape kit. With these coils larger amounts of vapour will be created, to support this we recommend you use e-liquids that are 60% VG or higher. Due to the larger amounts of vapour created. We advise that you do not use an e-liquid that has higher than a 6mg nicotine strength.

name: Trap Queen by Nasty
subDescription:
Trap Queen by Nasty is a taste of delightfully ripe strawberries, freshly harvested from the farm. Nasty Juice, a renowned e-liquid producer hailing from Malaysia, has concocted an exquisite flavor called "Trap Queen". This particular e-liquid blend comprises the essence of succulent strawberries intermixed with a gentle trace of menthol. As a result, it evokes a sweet and invigorating sensation upon the palate. The subtle menthol component contributes a crisp, arctic quality to the concoction, thereby making it an ideal option for sweltering summer weather or moments when a revitalizing vaping experience is in order. Trap Queen by Nasty is the perfect vape juice for those who love a deliciously fruity and refreshing vaping experience. This exquisite blend of ripe strawberries, juicy peaches, and tangy citrus fruits is a true masterpiece that will have you feeling like royalty with every puff. The benefits of Trap Queen by Nasty are endless. Firstly, its tantalizing flavor profile is sure to satisfy even the most discerning of palates. Whether you're in the mood for something sweet, sour, or tangy, this vape juice has got you covered. With every inhale, you'll experience a burst of succulent strawberries, followed by the juicy and luscious notes of ripe peaches, rounded off by a zesty finish of citrus fruits. But that's not all. The quality of this vape juice is unmatched. Crafted with the highest quality ingredients and a keen eye for detail, Trap Queen by Nasty delivers a smooth and consistent vaping experience every time. Its superior blend of propylene glycol and vegetable glycerin ensures that you'll enjoy a satisfyingly thick and flavorful vapor that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to experience a vape juice fit for a queen? Look no further than Trap Queen by Nasty. Here are just a few of the amazing benefits of this premium vape juice:
  • Sweet and fruity flavor: Trap Queen is bursting with the taste of ripe, juicy strawberries. This vape juice delivers a deliciously sweet and fresh flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling.
  • Smooth vaping experience: The high-quality ingredients in Trap Queen provide a smooth and satisfying vaping experience. You'll enjoy the perfect amount of throat hit without any harshness or irritation.
  • Long-lasting flavor: The intense flavor of Trap Queen lingers on your tongue long after you exhale. You won't have to constantly reapply this vape juice, making it an excellent value for your money.
  • High vapor production: With Trap Queen, you'll produce thick, satisfying clouds of vapor that are sure to impress. The rich flavor and impressive vapor production make this vape juice perfect for cloud chasers and flavor enthusiasts alike.
  • Perfect for any occasion: Whether you're relaxing at home, out with friends, or on the go, Trap Queen is the perfect vape juice to accompany you. Its delicious flavor and impressive performance make it an ideal choice for any vaping situation.
Don't settle for subpar vape juice when it comes to your vaping experience. Upgrade to Trap Queen by Nasty today and indulge in the deliciously satisfying flavors and high-quality vapor that only this premium vape juice can provide. Add it to your cart now and reign supreme in the world of vaping.

Dinner Lady are one of the biggest names in e-liquid. Made in the UK, their ranges span from authentic-tasting dessert e-liquids all the way to fruit and ice medleys, for a sweet and cool vape. name: Cubano Black by VGOD
subDescription:
Cubano Black 60ml by VGOD: Your Ultimate Vape Companion

Vaping has become a popular alternative to traditional smoking, and as a passionate vape enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting vape flavors. Recently, I had the pleasure of trying Cubano Black by VGOD, and let me tell you, it did not disappoint! In this review, I'll be sharing my personal experiences with this premium vape juice and why I believe it's worth considering for your next vaping session.

 Cubano Black By VGOD: The Perfect Blend of Rich Tobacco and Creamy Custard

If you're a fan of tobacco-flavored vapes, Cubano Black is sure to captivate your senses. This vape juice is the perfect blend of rich, robust tobacco and smooth, creamy custard, creating a truly indulgent flavor profile that will leave you craving for more. The first thing that struck me about Cubano Black was its authentic tobacco taste. Unlike other tobacco vapes I've tried in the past, Cubano Black delivers a true-to-life tobacco flavor that's rich and satisfying. The subtle hints of sweetness from the custard balance out the boldness of the tobacco, creating a harmonious blend that's simply irresistible. One of the things I appreciate about Cubano Black is its versatility. Whether you're in the mood for a morning pick-me-up, an afternoon delight, or an evening treat, Cubano Black can be enjoyed at any time of the day. Its smooth and velvety texture makes for a luxurious vaping experience, and the well-balanced flavors keep your taste buds intrigued with every puff.

Unleash the Clouds with VGOD's High-Quality E-liquid

As an experienced vaper, I know the importance of high-quality e-liquid in delivering a satisfying vaping experience, and VGOD does not disappoint with Cubano Black. This premium vape juice is made from top-quality ingredients, ensuring a smooth and consistent vaping experience every time. One of the things that sets VGOD apart is their commitment to producing e-liquids that are free from harmful substances. Cubano Black is made with high-quality, food-grade ingredients and does not contain any diacetyl, acetyl propionyl, or harmful chemicals. This gives me peace of mind knowing that I'm vaping a safe and premium product. The packaging of Cubano Black is also noteworthy. The sleek black bottle with its eye-catching gold accents not only looks premium but also serves a practical purpose. The dropper design allows for easy and precise filling of my vape tank, minimizing the risk of spills or leaks.

Comparing Cubano Black to Other Tobacco Vapes

As a seasoned vape enthusiast, I've tried my fair share of tobacco-flavored vapes, and Cubano Black stands out as one of the best I've come across. Its authentic tobacco taste, combined with the creamy custard notes, sets it apart from other similar products in the market. In comparison to other tobacco vapes, Cubano Black has a more pronounced tobacco flavor that's bold and robust without being overpowering. The creamy custard adds a layer of complexity to the flavor profile, creating a unique and enjoyable vaping experience that keeps me coming back for more. Another notable difference is the smoothness of the vape. Cubano Black delivers a velvety texture with each puff, making it a pleasure to vape. Some other tobacco vapes I've tried in the past can be harsh on the throat, but Cubano Black is smooth and enjoyable even at higher wattages, allowing me to produce thick, satisfying clouds without any discomfort. Pros & Cons Pros:
  1. Authentic tobacco flavor: Cubano Black delivers a true-to-life tobacco taste that's rich and robust, perfect for tobacco vape enthusiasts.
  2. Smooth and velvety

What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh throat hit and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.
This is because the salts alter the Ph. balance of the liquid, making it more akin to human physiology.
**Warning: Not For Sub-Ohm Use** Recommended for use with: Pod System Devices

Brain Freeze by Naked 100 Salt Nic is refreshing on a whole new level, featuring perfectly ripe Strawberries and crisp Kiwi, backed with subtle yet complex Ruby Red Pomegranate essence, all served ice cold.

Brain Freeze by Naked 100 Salt Nic Features

Brand Name: Naked 100 Flavor: Strawberries, crisp Kiwi & Red Pomegranate VG/PG: 50VG/50PG Nicotine Strength: 35MG Nozzle: Dripper Size: 30 ml Check out all Salt Nic Flavours
What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh throat hit and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.
This is because the salts alter the Ph. balance of the liquid, making it more akin to human physiology.

SMOK Rolo Badge
subDescription:
Vape Pods-SMOK Rolo Badge

SMOK's Rolo Badge is an all in one system aimed at providing a combination of ease of use, and a rich flavor ecosystem with a striking badge like chassis and a 2ml powered plug and play Pod system. The Rolo Badge is capable of 10 to 16W of output and 3.3 to 4.2V of input voltage. The Rolo Badge utilizes a draw activated firing mechanism that makes general use feel organic and natural, while the Rolo Badge's Plug and Play Connection uses a proprietary magnetic connection. Each Rolo Badge Pod features a 2ml capacity for your favorite Salt Nic E-Liquid. Powering the Rolo Badge's voltage based output is a integrated rechargeable 250 mAh battery that can be charged through a USB cable for minimum downtime. Entering the new generation of all in one systems and ultra portable kits with one of the first ceramic wicking materials utilized in their pod system, SMOK's Rolo Badge Ultra Portable System brings one of the best flavor experiences in it's respective market segment. Not much bigger than a key fob, the Rolo Badge from SMOK has style and a superior level of performance. Drop a SMOK Badge in your pocket or purse, and you're ready for any adventure.

SMOK Rolo Badge Features

The SMOK Rolo Badge has great aesthetic appeal. It comes in eight stunning finishes that are classy and elegant. Best of all, when you take this unit out, it doesn't draw a lot of attention. You can slip away for a quick, discreet vape without creating a fuss. Some devices that claim to be portable can also be prone to leaks and spills. You won't have to worry about that with the Rolo. The pod system is exceptional at preventing leaks. For a small device, this unit can also take a beating. It will hold up for a long time when cared for properly.

name: VGOD Stig Cubano
subDescription:
VGOD Stig Cubano is a smooth Cubano cigar with a drizzle of creamy vanilla, providing a fresh and rich Cuban tobacco flavor! The Stig disposable pod kit from VGod is a highly-portable lightweight device with an extremely simple user interface. Unlike most vape kits there are no confusing settings to adjust in order to operate the device. That is making this an ideal choice for the novice vaper. Powering on, charging, and refilling the tank are issues of the past with the Stig as all you need to do is unwrap the pod from its outer packaging and inhale on the mouthpiece to receive full and satisfying vapour. When your Stig pod reaches the end of its lifespan simply throw it away and open a new one. There are three pods included in a pack and each one is pre-loaded with 1.2ml of 20mg e-liquid. This is equivalent to roughly twenty classic tobacco cigarettes, meaning that each pack will keep you going for the same amount of time as sixty cigarettes. If you’re trying to kick your smoking habit the Stig pod system is a fantastic method of smoking cessation, delivering a generous and satisfying amount of nicotine every time without being overly harsh on the throat. The Stig uses highly-concentrated salt nic e-liquid which absorbs into the blood far quicker than regular e-liquid. This will ensure that you feel satisfied for a long period of time and will therefore mean you need to vape less often. These Stig pods are prefilled with Cubano: one of VGod’s bestselling e-liquids. Cubano is a rich blend of Cuban cigar with just a hint of warming vanilla.

VGOD Stig Cubano Features:

  • Disposable Pod System
  • Nicotine Strength: 60 MG
  • Tank capacity: 1.2 ml
  • Life Cycle: Approximately 270 - 300 puffs
  • Pack of 3

subDescription:
Introducing Cotton Bacon Prime, the ultimate vaping essential now available in Dubai! Crafted meticulously to elevate your vaping experience, this premium cotton promises unparalleled absorption and flavor delivery. Cotton Bacon Prime redefines the vaping experience with its superior-quality cotton strips. Designed specifically for rebuildable atomizers, it ensures a smoother, cleaner, and more consistent vaping session. These cotton strips boast a natural white hue, emphasizing their purity and high-quality composition. Each package contains generous strips of Cotton Bacon Prime, precisely cut to fit various coil sizes, ensuring convenience and ease of use for all vapers. Perfectly tailored for vaping enthusiasts, Cotton Bacon Prime simplifies the process of wicking coils. Its optimal thickness and absorbency allow for efficient liquid saturation, resulting in enhanced flavor and vapor production. When you choose Cotton Bacon Prime, you're opting for reliability and excellence. It provides consistent performance, allowing you to indulge in a seamless vaping experience every time you replace your wick. This premium cotton offers exceptional heat resistance, reducing the risk of dry hits and burnt flavors. Its pharmaceutical-grade quality ensures a tasteless and odorless experience, allowing the true flavors of your e-liquids to shine through.

Features of Cotton Bacon Prime:

  • Enhanced Absorption: Swiftly absorbs e-liquid for consistent vaping without dry hits.
  • Unparalleled Flavor Delivery: Preserves natural e-liquid flavors without any additional taste.
  • Optimal Thickness: Precisely cut strips for easy handling and proper saturation.
  • Heat Resistance: Withstands high temperatures, preventing burnt hits.
  • Versatility: Accommodates single or multi-coil setups effortlessly.
  • Purity and Cleanliness: Pharmaceutical-grade cotton for a hygienic experience.
  • Easy-to-Use Design: Simplifies the wicking process, beginner-friendly.
  • Consistency: Uniform quality for reliable performance every time.

With its user-friendly design and premium quality, it's tailored to meet the diverse needs of vaping enthusiasts, ensuring a delightful vaping experience for all. Versatile and adaptable, Cotton Bacon suits a wide range of vaping setups, making it an ideal choice for various vape devices and coil configurations. Its consistent performance across different setups ensures a reliable vaping experience each time you use it. Embraced by the vaping community globally, Cotton Bacon Prime has earned its reputation as a trusted and preferred choice among vapers who seek quality, consistency, and superior flavor. Crafted from high-grade, natural cotton fibers, Cotton Bacon Prime stands out for its sustainable and eco-friendly composition. It's free from chemicals or additives, aligning with environmentally conscious vaping practices. Each package of Cotton Bacon is thoughtfully designed for ease of use. The resealable pouch ensures the cotton stays fresh and ready for your next wicking endeavor. Convenient and practical, it's a must-have addition to your vaping kit. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, Cotton Bacon Prime undergoes rigorous quality control measures to ensure consistency and reliability. name: VGOD Elite RDTA
subDescription:
The VGOD ELITE RDTA presents a cloud-chasing achievement in a rebuildable dripping tank system, featuring a performance-ready structure with a unique two-post build deck design, vacuum wicking system, and bottom airflow delivery. The structure of the ELITE RDTA measures 24mm in diameter with high-quality construction, precisely executed with streamlined design and CNC engravings. The maximum juice capacity measures 4 milliliters, refilled via center fill port located inside the top cap. The two-post build deck is highly intuitive, presenting a user-friendly way to mount and secure wires. Coil leads are inserted into the two terminals, which are tightened with the knurled cap, clamping the coil in a consistent and secure manner (similar to Clamp Snag System). The result provides superior conductivity and a unique mounting experience, capable of maneuvering with Phillips or flathead screwdriver. Airflow was created with the intention of providing unsurpassed vapor and flavor, with air channels entering the two large exterior airlots and redirected up into the chamber section. VGOD ELITE RDTA Features:
  • 4mL Juice Reservoir
  • 24mm Diameter
  • Superior Stainless Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • 20mm Spacious Build Deck
  • Unique Two-Post Design - Clamp Snag System
  • Top-Secured via Phillips or Flathead Screws
  • 2mm Terminal Hole - 11mm Post Spacing
  • Deckmilled Negative
  • PEEK Insulator
  • Vacuum Wicking System
  • Dual Exterior Bottom Airflow
  • Two Internal Airholes - Direct-to-Coil Delivery
  • Convenient Fill Port Inside Chamber
  • Sloped Delrin Widebore Drip Tip
  • Gold-Plated 510 Connection - Protruding Pin
Includes:
  • 1 ELITE RDTA
  • 1 Multi-Tool Screwdriver
  • Spare Parts & Glass Tube

name: VGOD Elite RDA
subDescription:
VGODs Elite series RDA is one of the most innovative designs to date. Featuring a 9.25mm ejuice well for long intervals between re-dripping makes it one of the deepest! The Elite RDA has a very unique build deck equipped with a flat 2-post which allows the coils to share a post hole. Airflow holes are positioned toward the bottom of the RDA for direct coil contact, as well as having elevated air tubes to prevent ejuice leaking. Thumb screws to easily get threads started, along with phillips heads to secure the screws down completely. The Elite RDA is hybrid friendly with its protruding 510 pin, this can be used on most hybrid devices! The wide bore tip allows for heat dissipation and increased vapor production, and is threaded and removable for cleaning purposes. VGOD Elite RDA Specs/Features:
  • VGOD engraved Elite RDA shield
  • Well depth 9.25mm
  • Well capacity 2ml
  • Hybrid friendly protruding gold plated 510 pin
  • 24mm Diameter
  • 33mm (less 510) Height Dual posts, 2mm hole
  • Finger tight nut, Philips or flat
  • Post hole spacing, ID 11mm
Included in Box:
  • (1) VGOD Elite RDA
  • (1) Spare O-rings
  • (1) Multi Tool

name: Digiflavor Mesh Pro RDA
subDescription:
Digiflavor have developed a new rebuildable dripper capable of accommodating both mesh wires and standard wires, introducing the Mesh PRO 25mm RDA with a dual clamp-style postless build deck with squonk-ready functionality. An advancement in ergonomic designs, the Digiflavor Mesh PRO RDA implements an elevated build deck with postless design for a spacious chamber, necessary for accommodating mesh wires. To properly utilize the Mesh PRO RDA, the mesh sheet is placed between the individual clamp bar on each opening, side-secured via a large slotted flathead screws to create an effective attachment. Due to the design of the terminal openings and clamping mechanism, the Mesh PRO RDA allows for the accommodation of standard coils, whether it is single or dual configurations. The juice well is cleverly designed to allow efficient squonk-ready set-up, with an included bottom-feeding 510 pin that feeds directly into the juice well.
Digiflavor Mesh Pro 25mm RDA Features:
  • 25mm Diameter
  • Deep Juice Well
  • Superior 304 Stainless Steel Construction
  • Elevated Gold-Plated Build Deck
  • Dual Terminals Postless Design
  • Clamp-Shelf Mechanism - Properly Secure Mesh Sheet
  • Lock Down via Large Slotted Flathead Screw per Post
  • 8-Hole Airslots on Each Side
  • 18mm Wide 810 Delrin Drip Tip
  • 10mm High 510 Delrin Drip Tip
  • 510 Drip Tip Adapter
  • Bottom-Feeding Squonk 510 Pin
  • Gold-Plated 510 Contact Pin
Includes:
  • 1 Mesh Pro RDA
  • 1 810 Delrin Widebore Drip Tip
  • 1 510 Delrin Widebore Drip Tip
  • 1 510 Drip Tip Adapter
  • 1 510 Squonk-Ready Pin
  • 1 T-Tool Screwdriver
  • 3 Mesh Wires - KA1, Ni80, SS316
  • Instructional Manual

name: DigiFlavor Themis RTA
subDescription:
The Themis 25mm RTA by Digiflavor is the avent-garde of top airflow rebuildable system, featuring an innovative interchangeable build deck design with Dual Coil Version and Mesh Version along with dynamic, leak-proof top airflow performance. Maintaining the high-quality motto of Digiflavor's dependable manufacturing process, the Themis RTA measures 25mm in diameter with beautiful stylish designs featuring protective metal barrel sleeve around the glass and precision knurled processing on the bottom and top of the structure. The maximum juice capacity is 5 milliliters, accessed threaded top-fill method. The central core of the Themis RTA is the embodiment of innovation and versatility, featuring an interchangeable build deck with two versatile designs. The Dual Coil Version comes with a postless, quad terminals style to accommodate a wide range of single or dual coil configurations. The Mesh Version is built to accommodate the flavor-orientated mesh wires, with the option of accommodating various single builds as well. Similar in designs to the Zeus RTA, the leak-proof structure focuses upon the dual top airflow design. The air channel travels downward to dual three-slotted internal side walls and into the coil structure before rising vertically through the chimney. Furthermore, the kit includes a 510 Delrin widebore drip tip with the optional 810 Delrin widebore drip tip for extended versatility. Digiflavor Themis RTA Features:
  • 25mm Diameter
  • 5mL Maximum Juice Capacity
  • Superior Stainless Steel Construction
  • High-Temp Resistant Silica Glass Reinforcement
  • Stylish Metal Sleeve
  • Interchangeable Build Deck

  • Efficient Wicking System

  • Convenient Threaded Top-Fill Method
  • 810 Delrin Straight Widebore
  • 510 Delrin Straight Widebore
  • 510 Drip Tip Adapter
  • Adjustable Gold-Plated 510 Contact Pin

name: DigiFlavor Pharaoh RTA
subDescription:
The Digiflavor Pharaoh RTA is the new flagship atomizer following the cutting-edge designs of the original Pharaoh Dripper Tank, featuring an innovative build deck design with dual airflow systems for high-performance throttle and possibilities. An extension of the continual collaboration between Digiflavor and Rip Trippers, the Pharaoh RTA is precisely designed in specific areas to improve overall effectiveness. The Pharoah RTA measures 25mm in diameter in premium stainless steel construction and visual striking chassis, with a standard structure holding up to 4.6 milliliters of?top-shelf e-juice. By deploying an optional juice expansion tube, the juice reservoir increases by another 3mL for a staggering maximum capacity of 7.6mL. The entire apparatus was elaborately created with attention to every single details, ranging from the domical top cap in the chamber to optimize flavor production to the shorter shaft section to further intensify the flavor experience. Airflow of the Pharaoh RTA deploys dual massive bottom airholes in horizontal arrangement and controlled by a precision click-clock AFC ring, feeding into the internal chamber with ample air production. The top airflow is strategically designed with an angled orientation, funneling vapors in a more concentrated, flavor-orientated manner to provide a brand-new experience. The result is a truly dynamic dual airflow system that is fully adjustable catering to flavor enthusiasts or fully opened for cloud-chasing capability. The pre-installed two-post design is inspired by the original Pharaoh Dripper, integrating a spring-loaded component to the clamp-secured quad terminals. Coil leads are inserted within the widespace between the large surface area of the terminal base and the clamp itself, secured via a centrally positioned Phillips-screws for a tremendous range of coil structure configurations. The build deck section is fully interchangeable, with more options available in the future ranging from Velocity-Style two-post to postless deck designs. The collective efforts between Rip Trippers and the creative manufacturers of Digiflavor continues to innovative the industry, with the Pharaoh RTA showcasing one of the best rebuildable platform of the year. Digiflavor Pharaoh RTA Features:
  • Design Collaboration by Digiflavor and RiP Trippers
  • A Rip Trippers Project
  • 25mm Base Diameter
  • 27mm Diameter at Widest Point
  • 4.6mL Juice Capacity - Standard Configuration
  • Additional 3mL Juice Expansion Tube Included
  • Premier Stainless Steel Construction

  • Interchangeable Build Deck Designs
  • Unique Clamp-Style Two-Post Design
  • Centrally Secured via Phillips Screws
  • Spring-Loaded Clamps for Easier Set-ups
  • Phillips Screws - Heat-Treated for Durability
  • Dynamic Aiflow Control System

  • Top Angled Airflow - Flavor-Enhanced
  • Domical Top Cap Design
  • Shorter Shalf Section
  • Dual-Layered Delrin Widebore Drip Tip
  • 510 Drip Tip Adapter
  • Adjustable Gold-Plated 510 Connection
Includes:

name: Smok TFV12 Prince
subDescription:
Smok TFV12 Prince-Vape Tanks

Smok TFV12 Prince Sub-Ohm presents the next rendition of high-caliber Sub-Ohm system, retaining the high-performance features from the TFV12?with significant upgrades to the structure and introducing the new V12 Prince Coil System. An evolutionary upgrades of the TFV series, the TFV12 Prince Sub-Ohm Tank measures 25mm in diameter with the avant-garde designs SMOKTech?has come to known for. The material science of the tank itself have improved, utilizing Food-Grade glass material with high-temperature resistant for the reservoir and precision welding for the frame of the structure. The TFV12 Prince has upgraded the signature rotary hinge top-fill method, with the implementation of a new locking mechanism that can be accessed when pushing the lock button. The standard juice capacity is a 5 milliliter capacity, with the option of upgrading to a massive 8mL maximum capacity when using the new Convex bulb extension glass. The TFV12 Prince integrates a brand-new coil family, headlined with the 0.12ohm V12 Prince-T10 labed as Decuple Coils with five cylinders design in vertical orientation capable of firing up to 120W. Each kit also comes with a 0.4ohm V12 Prince-Q4 Quadruple Coil with a wattage range of 40-100W and a 0.15ohm V12 Prince X-6 Sextuple Coil with a range of 50-120W. The TFV12 Prince Tank features a new Cobra widebore drip tip made with dyed resin materials and a striking scale pattern to complete the phenomenal system. A pinnacle of cloud-chasing accomplishment as a result of exceptional execution and prolific designs, the SMOK TFV12 Cloud Beast Prince is a universally appealing platform with impressive performance capabilities.
Note:The SMOK TFV12 Prince is not compatible with the regular TFV12 Coils. You can purchase the correct coils under the Quick Links below.

Smok TFV12 Prince Sub-Ohm Tank Features:

  • 25mm Base Diameter
  • 5mL Standard Juice Capacity
  • 8mL Maximum Juice Capacity - Convex Glass Extension
  • Superior Stainless Steel Construction
  • High-Grade Glass Reinforcement

  • Massive Dual Adjustable Airflow Control at Base
  • 810 Cobra Resin Ultra-Wide Drip Tip

  • 0.15ohm V12 Prince-X6 Sextuple Coils - rated for 50-120W
  • 0.4ohm V12 Prince-Q4 Quadruple Coils - rated for 40-100W
  • 510 Connection

The TFV12 Prince has upgraded the signature rotary hinge top-fill method, with the implementation of a new locking mechanism that can be accessed when pushing the lock button. The standard juice capacity is a 5 milliliter capacity, with the option of upgrading to a massive 8mL maximum capacity when using the new Convex bulb extension glass. The TFV12 Prince integrates a brand-new coil family, headlined with the 0.12ohm V12 Prince-T10 labed as Decuple Coils with five cylinders design in vertical orientation capable of firing up to 120W. Each kit also comes with a 0.4ohm V12 Prince-Q4 Quadruple Coil with a wattage range of 40-100W and a 0.15ohm V12 Prince X-6 Sextuple Coil with a range of 50-120W. The TFV12 Prince Tank features a new Cobra widebore drip tip made with dyed resin materials and a striking scale pattern to complete the phenomenal system. A pinnacle of cloud-chasing accomplishment as a result of exceptional execution and prolific designs, the SMOK TFV12 Cloud Beast Prince is a universally appealing platform with impressive performance capabilities.
Note:The SMOK TFV12 Prince is not compatible with the regular TFV12 Coils. You can purchase the correct coils under the Quick Links below.

Cubano Black by VGOD Salt Nic
subDescription:
Cubano Black by VGOD Salt Nic: The Perfect Vape for a Rich and Satisfying Experience

If you're a fan of vaping and enjoy the rich and satisfying flavor of Cuban cigars, then Cubano Black by VGOD Salt Nic is a must-try for you. As a passionate vaper who has tried numerous e-liquids in the past, I can confidently say that Cubano Black has quickly become one of my favorites. In this review, I'll share my personal experience with this premium e-liquid, explaining why it stands out among the competition and why I highly recommend it to fellow vape enthusiasts like you.

The Flavor of Cubano Black by VGOD Salt Nic

When it comes to e-liquids, flavor is king. And Cubano Black delivers an exquisite flavor that sets it apart from other e-liquids I've tried. The first thing you'll notice when you take a puff is the smooth and robust taste of Cuban cigars. The rich tobacco flavor is perfectly complemented by a hint of sweetness, giving it a well-balanced profile that is truly satisfying. The flavor is so authentic that it almost feels like you're savoring a fine Cuban cigar, but without the smoke or the tobacco smell. It's a truly unique and enjoyable experience that I haven't found in any other e-liquid.

Smooth and Satisfying Nicotine Salt Experience

One of the things I love about Cubano Black is that it uses nicotine salts, which provide a smoother and more satisfying vaping experience compared to regular e-liquids. Nicotine salts are a form of nicotine that is absorbed by the body more efficiently, delivering a stronger and more satisfying hit. With Cubano Black, I've found that I can satisfy my nicotine cravings with fewer puffs, which means that a bottle lasts longer and provides better value for money.

A Perfect Blend for Sub-Ohm Vaping

If you're a sub-ohm vaper like me, you know how important it is to find an e-liquid that works well with your device. Cubano Black has a perfect blend of 70% Vegetable Glycerin (VG) and 30% Propylene Glycol (PG), which makes it ideal for sub-ohm vaping. The high VG content produces thick and dense clouds of vapor, while the balanced PG ratio ensures that the flavor is not compromised. The e-liquid flows smoothly through my tank and doesn't clog my coils, which means that I can enjoy a consistently great vaping experience without any issues.

Packaging and Design That Exude Quality

When it comes to e-liquids, packaging and design play an important role in creating a premium experience. Cubano Black comes in a sleek and stylish black bottle with a minimalist design that exudes quality. The bottle is made of sturdy and durable glass, with a child-proof cap that ensures safety. The label provides all the necessary information, including the nicotine strength and the flavor profile, in a clear and easy-to-read format. The attention to detail in the packaging and design of Cubano Black reflects the commitment of VGOD Salt Nic to delivering a premium product.

Pros & Cons

  • Pros:
    • Authentic and satisfying flavor of Cuban cigars
    • Smooth and satisfying nicotine salt experience
    • Perfect blend for sub-ohm vaping
    • High-quality packaging and design
  • Cons:
    • Limited availability of nicotine strengths
In conclusion, if you're a vape enthusiast who appreciates the rich and satisfying flavor of Cuban cigars, Cubano Black by VGOD Salt Nic is a must-try. Its authentic flavor, smooth nicotine salt experience, and perfect blend for sub-ohm vaping make it a standout e-liquid in the market. The high-quality packaging and

name: VGOD Stig Lush Ice
subDescription:
VGOD Stig Lush Ice is a delicious burst of fresh watermelon on the inhale with sweet undertones of mixed melons and menthol on the exhale. That provides a smooth and fruity all-day vaping experience. The VGOD Stig Lush Ice disposable pod kit from VGod is a highly-portable lightweight device with an extremely simple user interface. Unlike most vape kits there are no confusing settings to adjust in order to operate the device. That makes this an ideal choice for the novice vaper. Powering on, charging and refilling the tank are issues of the past with the Stig as all you need to do is unwrap the pod from its outer packaging and inhale on the mouthpiece to receive full and satisfying vapour. When your Stig pod reaches the end of its lifespan simply throw it away and open a new one. There are three pods included in a pack and each one is pre-loaded with 1.2ml of 20mg e-liquid. This is equivalent to roughly twenty classic tobacco cigarettes, meaning that each pack will keep you going for the same amount of time as sixty cigarettes. If you’re trying to kick your smoking habit the Stig pod system is a fantastic method of smoking cessation, delivering a generous and satisfying amount of nicotine every time without being overly harsh on the throat. The VGOD Stig Lush Ice uses highly-concentrated salt nic e-liquid which absorbs into the blood far quicker than regular e-liquid. This will ensure that you feel satisfied for a long period of time and will therefore mean you need to vape less often. These Stig pods are prefilled with Lush Ice, which is one of VGod’s most popular e-liquids. An invigorating mix of juicy watermelon and subtle menthol for a thoroughly awakening vape.

VGOD Stig Lush Ice Features:

  • Disposable Pod System
  • Nicotine Strength: 60 MG
  • Tank capacity: 1.2 ml
  • Life Cycle: Approximately 270 - 300 puffs
  • Pack of 3

Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh throat hit and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.

The Vaporesso LUXE 220W TC Starter Kit is an avant-garde set-up with the implementation of advanced OMNI Board 4.0 Chip, full-scale 2.0" TFT Color display, and luxurious designs to pair with the SKRR Sub-Ohm Tank with QF Air Distribution System. The Vaporesso LUXE 220W Box Mod integrates one of the most intelligent onboard technology, boasting Insta-Fire with an activation speed of 0.001s and Super Player Mode, a broad resistance range that is meant to be adaptive to most of the industry's tanks and mesh tanks. The high-end design caters to the breathtaking 2.0" TFT Full-Color display with vibration-enabled buttons for tactile feedback. Pairing with the LUXE 220W is the performance-focused Vaporesso SKRR Sub-Ohm Tank, featuring a staggering 8mL eJuice capacity, child-proof top-fill method, and the utilization of the QF Coil System. The Vaporesso SKRR Tank adopts the newly introduced Quadflow (QF) Air Distribution System, in which air channels enters the atomizer core and spread internally in four direction. This results in a more optimized airflow for dense clouds while maintaining a smooth delivery and prevents spit-back along with leak-free design. The Vaporesso QF Coil System utilizes the combination of cotton and flax materials for a long-lasting yet flavor-enhanced performance with the following coil options: 0.18ohm QF Meshed and 0.18ohm QF Strip. What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh throat hit and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.

Berry Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic
subDescription:
Berry Bomb 30ml by VGOD Salt Nic

 Berry Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic. As a seasoned vaper, I've had the chance to try out various e-liquids, and Berry Bomb quickly became one of my top choices. In this review, I'll share my personal experiences and insights on why this vape juice is worth considering for your vaping pleasure.

The Flavor of Berry Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic

When it comes to flavor, Berry Bomb does not disappoint. From the moment you take your first puff, you're greeted with an explosion of mouthwatering mixed berries that dance on your taste buds. The blend of sweet strawberries, tangy raspberries, and succulent blueberries creates a symphony of flavors that is both refreshing and satisfying. The sweetness is perfectly balanced, not overpowering, allowing for an enjoyable all-day vape experience. The natural and authentic taste of the berries is a testament to VGOD's commitment to using high-quality ingredients in their e-liquids.

Smooth Nicotine Delivery

One of the standout features of Berry Bomb is its smooth nicotine delivery. VGOD Salt Nic has formulated this e-liquid with nicotine salts, which are known for providing a more satisfying and smoother hit compared to traditional freebase nicotine. As someone who has transitioned from regular cigarettes to vaping, I appreciate the instant satisfaction that nicotine salts offer without the harsh throat hit often associated with higher nicotine concentrations. Berry Bomb is available in different nicotine strengths, making it suitable for both new vapers and those who require higher nicotine levels.

Effortless Vaping Experience

Another aspect that sets Berry Bomb apart is its user-friendly nature. The e-liquid is compatible with most refillable pod systems and low-wattage devices, making it a versatile option for vapers of all experience levels. The consistency of the e-liquid is just right, not too thick nor too thin, allowing for smooth and easy wicking, without any issues of dry hits or leaks. The 30ml chubby gorilla bottle is also convenient to carry around and makes refilling a breeze. With Berry Bomb, you can enjoy a hassle-free vaping experience that delivers consistent flavor and nicotine satisfaction every time.

Comparison with Other Similar Products

As an avid vaper, I've tried numerous berry-flavored e-liquids, but Berry Bomb stands out for several reasons. First and foremost, the authentic and vibrant flavor profile of Berry Bomb is unparalleled. The blend of mixed berries creates a truly delightful taste that is distinct from other berry e-liquids I've tried in the past. Additionally, the smooth nicotine delivery of Berry Bomb sets it apart from many other e-liquids. The use of nicotine salts ensures a more enjoyable and satisfying vaping experience without any harshness. Lastly, the user-friendly nature of Berry Bomb, with its compatibility with various devices and convenient bottle design, makes it a top choice for on-the-go vaping.

Pros & Cons

  • Pros:
  1. Bursting with authentic and vibrant mixed berry flavor.
  2. Smooth nicotine delivery with nicotine salts for a satisfying hit.
  3. User-friendly and convenient bottle design for easy refilling and on-the-go vaping.
  • Cons:
  1. Limited bottle size options, may not last long for heavy vapers.
In conclusion, Berry Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic is a standout e-liquid that delivers a flavor explosion, smooth nicotine hit, and effortless vaping experience. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced vaper, Berry Bomb is sure to satisfy your cravings for delicious mixed berry flavors with a satisfying nicotine kick. So why wait? Grab a bottle of Berry Bomb today and elevate your vaping experience to new heights!

subDescription:

Apple Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic has become a popular way for many people to enjoy their nicotine fix without the harmful effects of traditional smoking. As an avid vaper, I recently had the chance to try out Apple Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic, and let me tell you, it was a flavor explosion that left me craving for more!

Unleashing the Burst of Flavor 

One of the things that sets Apple Bomb apart from other e-liquids I've tried is its exceptional flavor profile. With every puff, I was greeted with a burst of sweet and tangy apple flavor that was both refreshing and satisfying. The apple notes were well-balanced, not too overpowering, and had a natural sweetness that was just right. It was like biting into a crisp, juicy apple with every inhale, making for a truly enjoyable vaping experience.

A Smooth and Satisfying Vape of Apple Bomb by VGOD Salt Nic

Another standout feature of Apple Bomb is its smoothness. The VGOD Salt Nic formula ensures a satisfying throat hit without any harshness or irritation. The nicotine salt provides a smoother delivery of nicotine compared to regular e-liquids, making it perfect for those who are looking for a more satisfying vape without the harshness of high nicotine levels. The smoothness of Apple Bomb allowed me to enjoy longer vaping sessions without any discomfort, and I found myself reaching for it as my go-to e-liquid throughout the day.

Compared to other apple-flavored e-liquids I've tried in the past, Apple Bomb has a more authentic apple taste that doesn't taste artificial or overly sweet. In terms of user-friendliness, Apple Bomb's convenient dropper tip and sleek packaging make it easy to use and transport, making it a top choice for on-the-go vapers.

I thoroughly enjoyed my experience with Apple Bomb and found myself reaching for it as my preferred e-liquid for my pod system. So why wait? The Aspire Breeze Replacement Coils features the latest atomizer technology for the ultra-portable Breeze Pocket AIO Kit and the Breeze 2 Kit. Engineered to add versatility to the Breeze, it an innovative replacement coils optimized for robust flavor recreation in smaller devices. Then, sweet honey lands on the tongue. With every exhale, smooth vanilla custard and caramelized brown sugar make your mouth water.

  • Perfectly balanced flavor profile that never becomes overpowering

name: JUUL Device Kit
subDescription:
Vape Pods-JUUL Device Kit

Anybody looking for a top-notch vaping experience should get the JUUL Device Kit from the Vape Dubai. This beautiful and svelte gadget is loaded with capabilities that will advance your vaping.
The JUUL Device Kit lets you easily enjoy your favourite e-liquids thanks to its strong battery and simple UI. With no burnt flavour or harsh hits, the gadget is made to give a smooth and enjoyable vaping experience. You'll enjoy the thick, tasty vapour this gadget creates as well as how convenient it is due to its small size and low weight.
Yet, the JUUL Device Kit is about more than simply outstanding flavour and practicality. It is also loaded with features that make it one of the most dependable and safest vaping products available right now. The gadget is designed with high-quality materials and contains a number of safety measures that ensure that you can enjoy your vaping without any worries.

Setup:

Pod mod e-cig devices are designed to be easily set up by any type of user. The JUUL E-Cig Starter Kit is the first of its kind and can be charged simply by magnetically attaching the device to a USB charger inserted into a desktop or laptop computer. Once charged, your JUUL vaporizer is ready to go. That's right: no buttons to push, no turning on, no settings to change; just inhale whenever you feel like it.

Performance:

The JUUL Starter Kit comes with JUULpod refills that come in 5% nicotine by weight strength (50mg nicotine). Each JUULpod contains 0.7ml of pre-filled e-liquid. This should allow for around 200 puffs per refill. With JUULpod refill options ranging from Virginia Tobacco to Crème Brûlée, there should be a flavour that will more than satisfy anyone's tastes.

Kit Size Specifications:

The pen starter kit is 4" tall by ¾" wide. It takes just one hour for a full charge, by simply standing it in the magnetic USB charger that comes with the starter kit.

Charging Indicator:

For updates on how much charge is left in your JUUL starter kit, simply tap it twice to show the charge level. Green means charge is high, yellow is medium, and red is low. Your indicator will also glow when you draw on the device.

Juul Device Kit Features

  • Powerful battery: You won't have to worry about running out of power in the middle of a vaping session since the JUUL Device Kit has a long-lasting battery that offers steady and dependable performance.
  • User-friendly design: The JUUL Device Kit is exceptionally easy to use and has a straightforward interface, making it the ideal option for both new and seasoned vapers.
  • Refillable pods: The JUUL Device Set includes refillable pods that make it simple to swap between tastes so you can always indulge in your preferred e-liquids.
  • High-quality materials: The JUUL Device Kit is built with high-quality materials that ensure its durability and longevity, so you can enjoy your vaping for years to come.
  • Advanced safety features: The JUUL Device Kit features a range of safety features that ensure your vaping experience is always safe and reliable, including overcharge protection, short circuit protection, and low voltage protection.
  • Sleek and stylish design: With its modern and stylish design, the JUUL Device Kit is the perfect choice for anyone who wants a vaping device that looks as good as it performs.
The JUUL Device Kit's adaptability is one of its finest features. This gadget has plenty to offer whether you're a novice or an expert vaper. You can simply tailor your vaping experience to your requirements and tastes thanks to its simple interface and user-friendly design.
Hence, the JUUL Device Kit from the Vape Dubai is the only option if you're seeking for a premium vaping gadget that offers outstanding performance, dependability, and simplicity.

Vaporesso Luxe ZV 220w & SKRR Tank Kit
subDescription:
SKRR Vape Tank Kit with Vaporesso Luxe ZV Vape Starter Kit

The Vaporesso LUXE ZV 200W Limited Edition Starter Kit was made in collaboration with Zophie Vapes, exemplifying a beautifully-crafted device with an updated OMNI Board 4.0 Chip, full-scale 2.0" Touch Screen Display to pair with the SKRR-S Sub-Ohm Tank. The Vaporesso LUXE ZV 200W presents many physical elements from the original LUXE 200W, with additional accessories and stunning colorways added inspired by Zophie Vapes herself as part of the exciting Project Z for an elaborate vape experience. The LUXE ZV Box Mod integrates one of the most intelligent onboard technology, boasting Insta-Fire with an activation speed of 0.001s and Super Player Mode, a broad resistance range that is meant to be adaptive to most of the industry's tanks and mesh tanks. The high-end design caters to the breathtaking 2.0" TFT Full-Color display with vibration-enabled buttons for tactile feedback and the Limited Edition provides a new, refreshing display. Pairing with the device is the updated Vaporesso SKRR-S Sub-Ohm Tank, now featuring threaded top-fill, upgraded dual bottom airflow ring, and the utilization of the QF Coil System. The SKRR-S Tank adopts the newly introduced Quadflow (QF) Air Distribution System, in which air channels enters the atomizer core and spread internally in four direction. The Vaporesso QF Coil System utilizes the combination of cotton and flax materials for a long-lasting yet flavor-enhanced performance with the following coil options: 0.18ohm QF Meshed and 0.18ohm QF Strip. PLEASE NOTE THIS DEVICE REQUIRES TWO BATTERIES WHICH ARE NOT INCLUDED, YOU CAN FIND BATTERIES UNDER THE ACCESSORIES MENU Quick Links: Vaporesso QF Replacement Coils SKRR Glass Vaporesso SKRR Glass Protector

Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic
subDescription:
Nasty-Cush Man Salt nic e juice

Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic delivers tropical fusions and icy undertones. The juicy mango complimented by a light mint twist brings a balanced and layered taste to this nicotine salt e-liquid. Based on the original Cush Man Nasty Juice.
  • 30ml of 50mg/ml nicotine salt e-juice
  • Sweet and fruity flavor of mango
  • Made with high-quality ingredients
  • Perfect for a smooth and satisfying vaping experience
Introducing Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic - the e-juice that will elevate your vaping game to the next level! With its sweet and fruity flavor of juicy mango, this e-juice is a real treat for your taste buds. It's like having a tropical vacation in every vape! Cush Man is made with high-quality ingredients, ensuring that you get the most out of your vaping experience. Whether you're a seasoned vaper or a newcomer, this e-juice will provide a smooth and satisfying experience. Its 50mg/ml nicotine salt formula provides a strong and satisfying hit, making it perfect for those who are looking for a more intense vaping experience. With its convenient 30ml size, you can take Cush Man with you wherever you go. No need to worry about running out of e-juice when you're on the go. And the best part? You can enjoy the delicious mango flavor all day long without having to worry about the dreaded vape tongue! The Nasty Salt Nic's Cush Man e-liquid embodies a fruity essence, specifically crafted to harmonize with pod systems and low-wattage vaporizing devices. It boasts of an intricate blend of premium ingredients, including a succulent and perfectly ripened mango, yielding an unparalleled and rich vaping encounter. The e-liquid is available in a plethora of nicotine intensities, granting vapers the ability to choose the potency that aligns with their personal preferences. Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic is the perfect e-liquid for those who want to elevate their vaping experience. This premium vape juice blends the sweet taste of ripe mangoes with a touch of cool menthol, creating a delicious and refreshing flavor that will tantalize your taste buds. Not only does Cush Man taste amazing, it also offers numerous benefits to enhance your vaping experience. The high-quality ingredients in this e-liquid produce a smooth and satisfying hit every time, reducing the harshness often associated with traditional e-liquids. Additionally, the salt nic formula provides a stronger and quicker nicotine hit, making it an ideal choice for those who want to curb their nicotine cravings in an effective and enjoyable manner. So, why settle for an average e-liquid when you can experience the ultimate vaping experience with Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic? The perfect balance of sweet and cool flavors, combined with the smoothness and satisfaction provided by the high-quality ingredients and salt nic formula, make Cush Man the ideal choice for anyone looking to elevate their vaping experience. Don't wait any longer to try the best of the best in e-liquids. Order your bottle of Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic today and discover the true meaning of a premium vape juice. Trust us, you won't be disappointed!

Cush Man by Nasty Salt Nic Features

Brand Name: Nasty Flavor: Fresh Mango VG/PG: 50VG/50PG Nicotine Strength: 35 MG Nozzle: Squeezer Size: 30 ml Check out all Salt Nic Flavours
What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh throat hit and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.
This is because the salts alter the Ph. balance of the liquid, making it more akin to human physiology.
**Warning: Not For Sub-Ohm Use**

subDescription:
Bad Blood by Nasty Salt Nic

Bad Blood by Nasty Salt Nic flavour delivers a distinctive taste right in the middle of cool and sweet. Juicy blackcurrant flavours dominate the inhale followed by icy mint tones on the exhale. Based on the original Bad Blood Nasty Juice.

  • Comes in 35mg and 50mg nicotine strengths
  • A blend of sweet and sour red apples
  • Perfect for use with pod systems and low wattage devices
Bad Blood by Nasty Salt Nic is the perfect e-juice for apple lovers who crave a little sour with their sweet. With a blend of juicy red apples that balance the perfect combination of sweet and sour, this e-juice is sure to become a fast favorite. Each 30mL bottle is packed with either 35mg or 50mg of nicotine, making it the perfect choice for those who are looking for a strong, satisfying hit. Whether you prefer a little extra kick or just a moderate nicotine boost, Bad Blood has got you covered. Bad Blood by Nasty Salt Nic is a premium e-liquid that packs a powerful punch of flavor with every puff. Whether you're a seasoned vaper or just starting out, Bad Blood is sure to become your new go-to. This e-liquid is specially crafted to deliver a smooth and consistent flavor with every use. No more bland or harsh hits, just pure, delicious flavor that you'll love. Whether you're using a pod system or a sub-ohm device, Bad Blood by Nasty Salt Nic will provide a perfect balance of flavor and cloud production. Don't let the small bottle fool you - this e-liquid packs a big punch of flavor and is perfect for on-the-go vaping. Keep it in your pocket or purse for a quick pick-me-up whenever you need it. Upgrade your vaping experience with Bad Blood by Nasty Salt Nic today! Tropical Mango by VGOD Salt Nic
subDescription:
Tropical Mango  by VGOD Salt Nic

If you're a vaping enthusiast like me, you're always on the lookout for new and exciting e-liquids to elevate your vaping experience. Well, look no further! I recently had the chance to try out Tropical Mango by VGOD Salt Nic, and let me tell you, it's a game-changer. In this in-depth product review, I'll share with you all the reasons why Tropical Mango should be your go-to e-liquid for an unmatched vaping delight.

The Flavor that Will Transport You to a Tropical Paradise

One of the first things that caught my attention about Tropical Mango is its incredibly luscious flavor. As soon as I took my first puff, I was instantly transported to a tropical paradise. The sweet and tangy notes of ripe mangoes danced on my taste buds, leaving me craving for more. The flavor is incredibly authentic, and I was pleasantly surprised by how well it replicated the taste of real mangoes. It's a perfect balance of sweetness and tanginess, without being overwhelming or artificial. If you're a fan of tropical fruits or mangoes in particular, you're in for a real treat with Tropical Mango.

Smooth and Satisfying Nicotine Experience

As a salt nicotine e-liquid, Tropical Mango provides a unique and satisfying vaping experience. The nicotine hit is smooth and satisfying, without any harshness or throat irritation. It delivers a quick and efficient nicotine rush, making it a great option for those looking to curb their nicotine cravings. The salt nicotine formula also ensures a faster absorption rate, allowing you to enjoy a satisfying vaping experience with fewer puffs. I found that it provided a smooth and fulfilling nicotine experience that kept me satisfied throughout the day, without any discomfort or irritation.

Convenience of Pod Systems

Tropical Mango by VGOD Salt Nic is specifically designed for use with pod systems, which makes it incredibly convenient for on-the-go vapers like me. Pod systems are compact, discreet, and easy to use, making them perfect for busy lifestyles. The e-liquid comes in a convenient 30ml bottle with a dropper, making it easy to fill up your pod without any mess or fuss. The bottle is also small enough to carry in your pocket or bag, so you can enjoy your favorite flavor wherever you go. The pod systems are also known for their efficiency in preserving the flavor and nicotine content of the e-liquid, ensuring a consistent and satisfying vaping experience.

Long-lasting and Value for Money

One thing that truly impressed me about Tropical Mango is its long-lasting nature. Despite its compact size, the 30ml bottle lasted me for quite a while, even with regular vaping. This makes it a cost-effective option compared to other e-liquids that tend to run out quickly. The value for money is further enhanced by the premium quality of VGOD Salt Nic's e-liquids. The flavor is robust and consistent throughout the bottle, without any degradation in quality over time. It's evident that VGOD Salt Nic takes pride in creating high-quality e-liquids that provide a memorable vaping experience.

Pros & Cons

Pros:
  1. Authentic and luscious tropical mango flavor that transports you to a tropical paradise.
  2. Smooth and satisfying nicotine experience without any harshness or throat irritation.
  3. Convenient pod system design for on-the-go vaping with long-lasting value for money.
Cons:
  1. Limited to use with pod systems, may not be suitable for vapers who prefer other types of devices.
In conclusion, Tropical Mango by VGOD Salt Nic is an exceptional e-liquid that has quickly become my top choice for a truly delightful vaping experience. Its authentic flavor, smooth nicotine hit, and convenient pod system design

name: Stargazing by Nasty
subDescription:
Stargazing by Nasty - An Unforgettable Vaping Experience

Are you ready to embark on an extraordinary vaping journey that will leave you mesmerized? Look no further than Stargazing by Nasty, a premium e-liquid that delivers an unparalleled vaping experience. As a seasoned vaper who has tried numerous e-liquids, I can confidently say that Stargazing by Nasty stands out from the crowd in terms of flavor, performance, and overall user experience. In this comprehensive product review, I will share my personal insights and impressions of this remarkable e-liquid, and why I believe it's a must-try for any vaping enthusiast.

Flavor Explosion that Will Leave You Craving for More

The first thing that struck me when I took my initial puff of Stargazing by Nasty was the explosive burst of flavor that filled my mouth. The blend of exotic fruits, including tangy blueberries, succulent blackberries, and zesty lemons, creates a symphony of taste that is simply unforgettable. The sweetness of the fruits is perfectly balanced with a hint of cooling menthol, which adds a refreshing twist to the flavor profile. The result is a unique and complex taste that lingers on your palate, leaving you craving for more with every puff.

Smooth and Satisfying Vaping Experience

The smoothness of Stargazing by Nasty is truly exceptional. The e-liquid is made with high-quality ingredients and undergoes rigorous testing to ensure its purity and consistency. When I took my first drag, I was amazed by how effortlessly the vapor glided across my tongue and down my throat. The throat hit was just right, not too harsh or too weak, providing a satisfying sensation without any discomfort. The vapor production was also impressive, creating thick clouds that added to the overall enjoyment of the vaping experience.

User-Friendly Packaging and Convenient Bottle Design

One thing that caught my attention right away was the eye-catching packaging of Stargazing by Nasty. The sleek and stylish design of the box, adorned with celestial images, immediately piqued my curiosity and made me eager to try the e-liquid. The bottle itself is also well-designed, with a child-resistant cap and a dropper tip that makes it easy to dispense the e-liquid without any mess or waste. The compact size of the bottle also makes it convenient to carry around, allowing you to enjoy your favorite vape flavor wherever you go.

Versatile and Compatible with Different Devices

Another aspect that I appreciate about Stargazing by Nasty is its versatility. The e-liquid is compatible with a wide range of vaping devices, including sub-ohm tanks, RDAs, RTAs, and pod systems, making it suitable for both novice vapers and experienced cloud chasers alike. I personally tried it on my favorite sub-ohm tank and was amazed by how well it performed. The flavor was incredibly rich and intense, and the vapor production was nothing short of impressive. Whether you prefer direct lung inhales or mouth-to-lung hits, Stargazing by Nasty delivers a satisfying vaping experience that can be customized to your preference.

Pros & Cons:

Pros:
  1. Explosive burst of exotic fruit flavors with a refreshing twist of menthol.
  2. Smooth and satisfying vaping experience with a well-balanced throat hit.
  3. User-friendly packaging and convenient bottle design for easy dispensing and portability.
Cons:
  1. Limited availability in some regions, may not be accessible to all vapers.
In conclusion, Stargazing by Nasty is a standout e-liquid that delivers an unforgettable vaping experience. From its explosive flavor profile and smooth throat hit to its user-friendly packaging and compatibility with different devices, this premium e-liquid has everything you need for an enjoyable and satisfying vaping session

name: MYLE Midnight Black
subDescription:
MYLE Midnight Black Vape Pods

Myle Midnight Black ultra portable pod system features
  • Plug-and-Play Ecosystem
  • Integrated 240mAh Rechargeable Battery
  • LED Light Battery Indicator
  • Direct Voltage-Based Output
  • Draw-Activated Firing Mechanism
  • 9mL Pre-Filled Juice Cartridges - Not Included
  • Each Pod Lasts ~240 Puffs
  • Micro USB Charger
  • Proprietary Gold-Plated Magnetic Connection

INCLUDES:

  • 1 MYLE Battery Kit
  • 1 Micro USB Charger
  • Instructional Manual

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

MYLE Ultra Portable Pod Kit delivers an elaborate and beautiful all-in-one vape kit featuring an integrated 240mAh rechargeable battery and a rich flavor ecosystem with prefilled 0.9mL MYLE Pod cartridges produced by SaltNic Brand. The MYLE Pod System implements intricate lines with futuristic impression that holds comfortably in-hand for ergonomic portability. Staying true to its closed-system core, the MYLE vape system is enabled by a draw-activated mechanism for a simple and easy-to-use platform. The addition of proprietary magnetic connection provides added convenience when replacing pods. The MYLE's pod system holds 0.9mL of e-juice with 50mg nicotine strength (Note: pods are not included)

Other Myle Suggestions:

  • Myle mini 2 Cubano
  • Myle mini 2 Iced Quadberry

Berry Bomb Iced by VGOD Salt Nic
subDescription:
Berry Bomb Iced 30ml by VGOD Salt Nic: Your Ultimate Vape Buddy

If you're a vape enthusiast like me, always on the lookout for the perfect e-liquid to satisfy your cravings, then look no further! I recently had the chance to try out Berry Bomb Iced by VGOD Salt Nic, and let me tell you, it's a game-changer. From its irresistible flavor to its smooth nicotine hit, this e-liquid has quickly become my go-to choice for an unforgettable vaping experience. In this review, I'll be sharing my personal insights on this remarkable product, giving you a detailed overview of what makes it stand out from the competition. So, sit back, relax, and let's dive into the world of Berry Bomb Iced!

Flavor Explosion :Berry Bomb Iced by VGOD Salt Nic,

One of the first things that caught my attention about Berry Bomb Iced is its mouthwatering flavor profile. Bursting with the natural sweetness of ripe berries, this e-liquid delivers a delightful explosion of fruity goodness with every puff. The berry medley is well-balanced, with notes of succulent strawberries, tangy raspberries, and juicy blueberries that blend harmoniously to create a symphony of taste on your palate. The best part? The icy twist that comes with it! The menthol kick adds a refreshing coolness to the mix, creating a unique and invigorating vaping experience that is perfect for hot summer days or whenever you're in need of a chill vape session.

Smooth Nicotine Delivery: A Satisfying Hit Without the Harshness

As someone who enjoys the satisfaction of nicotine without the harsh throat hit of traditional e-liquids, I was thrilled to discover that Berry Bomb Iced uses nicotine salts for a smoother vaping experience. Nicotine salts are a form of nicotine that is naturally extracted from tobacco leaves and then combined with benzoic acid to create a smoother and more potent form of nicotine. This means that you can enjoy a higher concentration of nicotine without the harshness that can sometimes come with freebase nicotine. With Berry Bomb Iced, I found that the nicotine hit was satisfying and fulfilling, allowing me to curb my cravings and enjoy a more enjoyable and smoother vape session.

Ease of Use: Convenient and User-Friendly

One of the things that impressed me about Berry Bomb Iced is its user-friendly design. The e-liquid comes in a convenient 30ml chubby gorilla bottle, making it easy to carry around and refill your favorite vape device. The bottle has a child-resistant cap, ensuring that it is safe to use and prevents any accidental spills. The dropper tip is also perfectly sized, allowing for precise filling of your tank or pod without any mess or wasted e-liquid. I also appreciate the clear labeling on the bottle, which displays the nicotine strength and flavor name, making it easy to identify and choose the right e-liquid for your preferences. Overall, Berry Bomb Iced is designed with the user in mind, making it a hassle-free and convenient option for vapers of all levels of experience.

Long-Lasting and Cost-Effective: A Great Value for Your Money

When it comes to e-liquids, durability and cost-effectiveness are important factors to consider. I was pleasantly surprised to find that Berry Bomb Iced is not only rich in flavor and nicotine satisfaction but also long-lasting, making it a great value for your money. The high-quality formulation of this e-liquid means that a little goes a long way, allowing me to enjoy multiple vape sessions without having to constantly refill my tank. This not only saves me time and effort but also helps me stretch my vaping budget. With Berry Bomb Iced, you can enjoy the taste and satisfaction you crave without breaking the bank, making it

Milk Of The Poppy By Vapetasia is a bold sweetness of ripe strawberries, and cream e-juice combination with the addition of a subtle breath of dragon fruit. Vapetasia offers your taste buds a rich, velvety, smooth and luscious mix of Milk of Poppy e-juice! The inhale starts with a wonderful strawberry delivery. The exhale goes over the tang of a dragon-fruit with a sheet of creamy flavor at the finish. Just one hit can make your day. Milk of the Poppy is a gourmet e-liquid that skillfully combines the bold sweetness of ripe strawberries, and Vapetasia's signature smooth creaminess in every cloud. This highly addictive blend will delight every all day vaping need. As you have come to know, Vapetasia knocks their flavors out of the park with just the right balance of strawberry, dragon-fruit, and cream! Available in 60ml gorilla bottles with a nice throat hit blend of 70/30 VG/PG Make yourself feel as if you are enjoying a relaxing day on a tropical island! Smok Mico 26w Pod System
subDescription:
Vape Pod Kits-Smok Mico

The SMOK MICO 26W Ultra Portable Pod Kit spearheads an all-in-one system with beautiful multi-colored resin panels in stunning designs, internal 700mAh rechargeable battery, and a refillable 1.7mL pod utilizing mesh and ceramic coils! The MICO Pod System deploys one of the most visually-striking design from SMOKTech to date, combining ergonomic structures with luxurious impression via unique resin fluid designs and a high-gloss finish. Operationally, the SMOKTech MICO is fully draw-activated powered by an integrated 700mAh rechargeable battery with intelligent LED battery indicators and a suite of safety protections. The MICO Pod has a maximum capacity of 1.7mL and side-fill with a rubber plug for convenient access. The coil structure truly makes the device stands out from most pod systems, offering a 0.8ohm Mesh Coil for a cloud-focused atomizing option and a 1.0hom Regular Coil for standard use within each package. There is an optional use with the 1.4ohm MICO Ceramic Pod - sold separately in the link below. Quick Links:
  • SMOK MICO Replacement Pods
  • Nic Salts

SMOK MICO Ultra Portable Kit Features:

  • Dimensions - 56.3mm by 46.5mm by 14.8mm
  • Weight - 65g
  • Integrated 700mAh Rechargeable Battery
  • Wattage Output Range: 10-26W
  • Voltage Input Range: 3.3-4.2V
  • Resistance Range: 0.8 ohm- 1.0 ohm
  • Direct Voltage Based Output
  • Draw-Activated Firing Mechanism
  • Intelligent LED Light Battery Indicator
  • Durable Zinc Alloy Construction
  • Unique Multi-Colored Resin Panels
  • Elegant High Gloss Finish
  • On/Off Toggle Switch
  • Fillable Pod System - Replaceable Cartridge
  • 1.7mL Juice Capacity - Side Fill Slot
  • 0.8ohm MICO Mesh Coils
  • 1.0ohm MICO Regular Coils
  • 1.4ohm MICO Ceramic Coils - Sold Separately
  • Air-Driven Pod System
  • Ergonomically Curved Mouthpiece
  • Convenient Lanyard Attachment
  • 8 Seconds Cut-Off Protection
  • Short-Circuit Protection
  • Low Voltage Warning
  • MicroUSB Port Charging System
  • Propreitary Magnetized Connection
  • Available in Prism Chrome, Black, Red, Blue, Rainbow, Gold, Green
Includes:
  • MICO Pod System x1
  • 0.8ohm MICO Mesh Pod x1
  • 1.0ohm MICO Regular Pod x1
  • Lanyard x1
  • MicroUSB Cable x1
  • Instructional Manual x1

Smok TFV8 BABY V2 Replacement Coils
subDescription:
Vape Coils-Smok TFV8 BABY V2

Smok TFV8 BABY V2 Replacement Coils are crafted with dense flavors and massive cloud production in-mind, utilizing a dynamic line-up of mesh cores introduced with the TFV8 Baby V2 Sub-Ohm Tank. The TFV2 Baby V2 Coils are optimized for mid-wattage to high-wattage configurations, offering a spectrum of mesh designs and multitude of holes to accommodate a range of experience. The TFV8 Baby V2 Replacement Coils come in three types: the A1, A2, A3 coil family;
  • The A1 coil head features a large heating area, rated at 0.17 ohm, single mesh with the capabilities of 90 to 140W (recommended at 110 to 130W).
  • The A2 coil head features dual heating cores for larger clouds, rated at 0.2 ohm, double mesh coils with the capabilities of 50 to 80W (recommended at 65 to 75W).
Compatibility: SMOK Stick V9 MAX Tank (part of Stick V9 MAX Kit) Coil Specifications: SMOK Baby V2 Coil Family
  • Baby V2 A1 Coil Head
    • 0.17 ohm
    • Mesh Coil
    • 90 to 140W Range
    • 110 to 130W Recommended Range
  • Baby V2 A2 Coil Head
    • 0.2 ohm
    • Dual Mesh Coil
    • 50 to 80W Range
    • 65 to 75W Recommended Range
  • Baby V2 A3 Coil Head
    • 0.15 ohm
    • Triple Coil Head
    • 60 to 100W
    • 80 to 90W Recommended Range
Make sure to properly prime each coils before use.

subDescription:
Mangerine Guava by Ice Monster Salt E-Liquid is a powerful but refreshing blend of tart tangerines and luscious guavas touched with a moderate helping of icy cool menthol to create a tropical fruity winter for the tastebuds to enjoy, even during the summertime.

Mangerine Guava by Ice Monster Features

Brand Name: Jam Monster Flavor: Mango, Tangerine, Guava and Mint VG/PG: 50VG/50PG Nozzle: Squeezer Size: 30 ml Check out all Salt Nic Flavours
What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh throat hit and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.
This is because the salts alter the Ph. balance of the liquid, making it more akin to human physiology.
**Warning: Not For Sub-Ohm Use**

name: Phix
subDescription:
Phix-Portable Vape Pods

The PHIX Ultra Portable System is the latest all-in-one system designed with ergonomics and portability in-mind, presenting a innovative cCell Ceramic Coil inside along with a rich ecosystem of flavor options (pods are sold separately). When fully assembled, the PHIX measures 110mm by 19mm by 10.75mm within a smooth structure and minimalist design styling. Staying true to its closed-system core, the deice is enabled by a draw-activated mechanism for a simple and easy-to-use platform. The addition of proprietary magnetic connection provides added convenience when replacing pods. A crowning achievement lies within the ability to use a cCell Ceramic Coil, truly unique for its segment that creates a phenomenal flavor recreation. The PHIX's pod system holds 1.5mL of e-juice with 5% nicotine and holds about 400 puffs per pod. Internally, the 280mAh rechargeable battery can be charged at a maximum rate of 1A with a convenient magnetic charge port to minimize downtime, with a full charge that lasts approximately 220 puffs. A culmination of continued research and innovative designs, the PHIX Ultra Portable Kit elevates the closed-end system segment into a whole new level. Quick Links: PHIX Replacement and Compatible Pods MLV PHIX Ultra Portable Kit Features:
  • Dimensions: 110mm by 19mm by 10.75mm
  • Plug-and-Play Ecosystem
  • Integrated 280mAh Rechargeable Battery
  • Full Charge Lasts About 220 Puffs
  • LED Light Battery Indicator
  • Voltage-Based Output
  • Draw-Activated Firing Mechanism
  • PHIX Pod System - Integrated cCell Ceramic Coil
  • 1.5mL Pre-Filled Juice Cartridges - Sold Separately
  • 1A Max USB Charging Port
  • Proprietary Gold-Plated Magnetic Connection
Includes:
  • 1 Device System
  • USB Cable
This product is specifically designed with high nicotine pods. We highly recommend this product for smokers who are trying to kick the bad habit :) Check out all new vape pods in our Home Page

Phix Butterscotch Tobacco Refill Pods are unique pod elements with up to 1.5mL pre-filled juice reservoir that is used in conjunction with the modern PHIX Ultra Portable System (sold separately). You will receive in each pack, four pods integrated with cCell Ceramic Coil inside.

We highly recommend this product for smokers who are trying to stop smoking :)
What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh  throat hit  and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine. 
This is because the salts alter the Ph. balance of the liquid, making it more akin to human physiology.

subDescription:
Loaded Salts-Cran apple E juice

Cran-Apple by Loaded Salts is a carefully balanced creation of nicotine salt blended with notes of crisp apple coupled with the tangy overtone of cranberries to create a delicious eJuice.

  • 50% VG

Check out all Salt Nic Flavours
What are Nic Salts?
Nic Salts e-liquids can provide a higher ratio of nicotine content, but with a less harsh  throat hit  and easier passage of nicotine across the blood-brain barrier than vapor using distilled nicotine.
This is because the  salts  alter the Ph. balance of the liquid, making it more akin to human physiology.
*This product contains nicotine salt and not recommended for use in Sub-Ohm Tank*

JUUL Starter Kit
subDescription:
Vape Starter Kits-JUUL Pods

JUUL Starter kit has everything a smoker needs to make the switch. Includes a JUUL Device, USB Charging Dock, and two JUUL pods in 5% nicotine strength (Virginia Tobacco, Mint). JUUL Starter Kit is a sleek and stylish e-cigarette that keeps everything simple. From the fine minds at JUUL Labs comes this pocket-sized, easy-to-use e-cig that takes a range of different JUUL pod refill options.

Setup:

Pod mod e-cig devices are designed to be easily set up by any type of user. The JUUL E-Cig Kit is the first of its kind and can be charged simply by magnetically attaching the device to a USB charger inserted into a desktop or laptop computer. Once charged, your JUUL vaporizer is ready to go. That's right: no buttons to push, no turning on, no settings to change; just inhale whenever you feel like it.

Performance:

The JUUL Starter Kit comes with JUUL pod refills that come in 5% nicotine by weight strength (50mg nicotine). Each JUUL pod contains 0.7ml of pre-filled e-liquid. This should allow for around 200 puffs per refill. With JUUL pod refill options ranging from Virginia Tobacco to Crème Brûlée, there should be a flavor that will more than satisfy anyone's tastes.

Kit Size Specifications:

The JUUL vape pen starter kit is 4" tall by ¾" wide. It takes just one hour for a full charge, by simply standing it in the magnetic USB charger that comes with the starter kit.

Charging Indicator:

Simply tap it twice to show charge level. Green means charge is high, yellow is medium and red is low. Your indicator will also glow when you draw on the device.

Nicotine Levels

JUUL's pods are infused with nicotine salts and contain 5% nicotine by weight. Giving you a smooth vape with reduced harshness, JUUL nicotine salts deliver absolute satisfaction with the perfect throat hit!

JUUL Starter Kit Features

Battery: Built in 250 mAh Color: Black and Silver Pods: 2 Pods (Mint & Virginia Tobacco) Pod capacity: 0.7 ml Pod Strength: 5% nicotine by volume Usage: 200 puffs/pod (approx) Pre-Filled Pods – Sold Separately - Click Here

Looking for a vaping experience that's refreshing, fruity, and downright invigorating? Look no further than FRZN Apple by BLVK!   • Suitable for all vaping devices: Whether you prefer a pod system or a box mod, FRZN Apple by BLVK is compatible with a wide range of vaping devices, so you can enjoy it no matter what your setup is.
But that's not all. When you take a puff of FRZN Apple, you'll feel an invigorating rush of cool menthol that will wake up your senses and leave you feeling refreshed and energized. Imagine taking a bite out of a crisp, juicy apple on a cold winter day – that's the kind of feeling you'll get from FRZN Apple. But don't just take our word for it. Customers have raved about the refreshing taste and invigorating sensation of FRZN Apple, with one customer saying:
