Looking for a vaping experience that's refreshing, fruity, and downright invigorating? Look no further than FRZN Apple by BLVK! With its crisp and juicy apple flavor, this e-juice will take your taste buds on a wild ride through an orchard in the middle of winter. But it's not just about the flavor. FRZN Apple is designed to give you a vaping experience like no other. Here are just a few of the features that make this e-juice stand out:
  • High-quality ingredients: BLVK is committed to using only the best ingredients in their e-juices, so you can enjoy a clean and satisfying vaping experience every time.
  • Chilled to perfection: FRZN Apple is infused with an icy blast of menthol that will leave your senses tingling and your mouth feeling fresh.
  • Suitable for all vaping devices: Whether you prefer a pod system or a box mod, FRZN Apple by BLVK is compatible with a wide range of vaping devices, so you can enjoy it no matter what your setup is.
But that's not all. When you take a puff of FRZN Apple, you'll feel an invigorating rush of cool menthol that will wake up your senses and leave you feeling refreshed and energized. Imagine taking a bite out of a crisp, juicy apple on a cold winter day – that's the kind of feeling you'll get from FRZN Apple. But don't just take our word for it. Customers have raved about the refreshing taste and invigorating sensation of FRZN Apple, with one customer saying:
"I've been vaping for years and this is hands down one of the best e-juices I've ever tried. The apple flavor is so crisp and refreshing, and the menthol just takes it to the next level. It's like a breath of fresh air with every puff."
So why wait? Give FRZN Apple by BLVK a try today and experience the ultimate in refreshing, fruity vaping. Order now and freeze your senses with every puff! Product details:
  • Flavor profile: Apple and menthol
  • Bottle size: 60ml
  • Nicotine level: 0mg, 3mg, 6mg
  • VG/PG ratio: 70/30
  • Made in the USA

Features Of FRZN Apple By BLVK:

  • Flavor profile: FRZN Apple by BLVK offers a distinctive and revitalising vaping experience by fusing the sweetness of fresh apples with the coolness of menthol.
  • High-quality ingredients: Only the best components are used to create this e-juice, guaranteeing a smooth and delicious flavour.
  • Customizable nicotine levels: FRZN Apple is offered in nicotine strengths of 0 mg, 3 mg, and 6 mg, allowing you to select the ideal dosage of nicotine for your need.
  • High VG/PG ratio: FRZN Apple generates impressive, tasty clouds with a VG/PG ratio of 70/30.
  • Crafted with care: The attention to detail that goes into every bottle of FRZN Apple by BLVK is evident in the precise flavor balancing and overall quality of the e-juice.
  • Made in the USA: FRZN Apple is proudly made in the USA, ensuring the highest standards of quality and safety.

Customer Reviews:

  • "FRZN Apple is my new favorite e-juice. The apple flavor is so fresh and the menthol gives it a cool, invigorating kick. Plus, the clouds it produces are amazing!" - Jennifer L.
  • "I love the combination of apple and menthol in this e-juice. It's so refreshing and perfect for a hot day. Definitely recommend!" - Mike R.
  • "This is hands down the best e-juice I've ever tried. The apple flavor is spot on and the menthol is just the right amount. It's the perfect all-day vape!" - Sarah K.

name: Vaporesso SKRR-S Tank 8ml
subDescription:
Vape Tanks 8ml For Vaporesso SKRR-S

Vaporesso SKRR-S Tank 8ml is the latest flagship Sub-Ohm Tank platform, presenting a staggering 8mL eJuice capacity, child-proof top-fill method, dynamic airflow channels, and the utilization of the QF Coil System. The tank adopts the newly introduced Quadflow (QF) Air Distribution System, in which air channels enters the atomizer core and spread internally in four direction. This results in a more optimized airflow for denser clouds while maintaining a smooth delivery in an astonishing manner. Within the prebuilt coils sits an innovative bullet head design with four inlet that prevents any spit-back from occurring and recycles any unvaporized eLiquid to be caught within the internal reservoir. The Vaporesso QF Coil System uses the combination of cotton and flax materials for a long-lasting yet flavor-enhanced performance with the following coil options: 0.18ohm QF Meshed, 0.18ohm QF Strip, and 0.5ohm QF CCELL with the use of the iconic ceramic cCell design. Quick Links: QF Replacement Coils GT Replacement Coils SKRR Glass Protector

Vaporesso SKRR-S Tank 8ml:

  • 30mm Diameter At Widest Point
  • 8mL Max Juice Capacity
  • Superior Stainlesss Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • Quadflow QF Air Distribution System

  • 0.15ohm QF Meshed - Rated for 55-85W
  • 0.15ohm QF Strip - Rated for 60-90W
  • 0.5ohm QF CCELL SS316L - Rated for 50-75W
  • Vaporesso GT Coil Compatible

Blaze No Ice by Pukka is the ultimate vaping experience for those looking for a smooth and refreshing flavor. This premium e-liquid is made with the highest quality ingredients to provide an unbeatable taste sensation that will leave you feeling satisfied every time.
The first thing you will notice about Blaze No Ice is its deliciously fruity aroma that will awaken your senses with every inhale. Once you take a puff, the smoothness of the vapor will take over, allowing you to enjoy the flavor without any harshness or discomfort. Blaze No Ice's absence of ice is one of its distinguishing qualities; this warmer vaping experience is ideal for people who find menthol e-liquids to be excessively chilly. Because of this, Blaze No Ice by Pukka is a great option for all seasons, whether you want to relax after a long day or just need a little boost. But what really sets Blaze No Ice apart is its focus on benefits over features. Instead of simply listing its ingredients or technical specifications, this e-liquid highlights the experience you will have when you vape it. You will feel refreshed, satisfied, and indulged in every puff. So, if you want to take your vaping experience to the next level, try Blaze No Ice by Pukka today. With its superior taste, smooth vapor, and focus on benefits, it is the perfect choice for anyone who wants a high-quality, luxurious vaping experience. Drag Mini by Voopoo
subDescription:
Experience High-Performance Vaping with the Drag Mini by Voopoo

Drag Mini by Voopoo is the perfect mid-level wattage vape system, integrated with a built-in 4400mAh battery and the exceptional GENE Fit Chip for battery-efficient outputs with various power modes to power the UFORCE T2 Sub-Ohm Tank.
A compact rendition of the iconic DRAG 157W while a modern chassis update, the Drag Mini by Voopoo 117W provides a smaller profile to fit comfortably in the hand while maintaining the visual prowess VOOPOO's devices have come to be known for. The internal GENE Fit Chip is quite dynamic and excellent for battery efficiency, with the addition of multiple output power adjustments such as Flavor Mode, Cloud Mode, and Battery Mode. The UFORCE T2 Tank features a 5mL maximum juice reservoir, ergonomic sliding top-fill design, triple-slotted airflow control, and the utilization of the mesh-capable UFORCE OCC Coil System.
In conclusion, Drag Mini by Voopoo is a fantastic vape kit that offers a strong and dependable vaping experience in a portable and stylish design. The innovative GENE. The FIT chip, large OLED display, and straightforward UI of this device make it adaptable and user-friendly. Additionally, the superior UFORCE T2 tank and long battery life make it a terrific choice for vapers who appreciate performance and simplicity. Look no further than the Drag Mini by Voopoo, which is presently on sale at our store in Vape Dubai, if you're looking for a top-of-the-line vape kit.

Drag Mini by Voopoo Features:

  • Brand: Voopoo
  • Weight: 0.135 kg
  • Compact and portable design
  • Maximum output of 117W
  • Built-in 4400mAh battery
  • Advanced GENE.FIT chip for fast firing and safety features
  • Large OLED display screen
  • User-friendly interface for easy navigation and adjustment of settings
  • UFORCE T2 sub-ohm tank with a 5ml capacity and adjustable airflow
  • Utilizes Voopoo's P2 and N1 coils for excellent flavor and vapor production
  • Convenient sliding top-fill design
  • Durable zinc alloy construction
  • Device color: Atrovirens, Coral, Island, Lava, Lime, Phthalo, Prussian, Prussian Blue, Purple, Rhodonite

VOOPOO UFORCE T2 Sub-Ohm Tank Features:

  • 25mm Tank Diamenter
  • 28mm At Widest Point
  • 3.5mL Standard Juice Capacity
  • 5mL Maximum Juice Capacity
  • Superior 304 Stainless Steel Construction
  • Pyrex Glass Reinforcement
  • Quick Vent Channel Design – Rapid Heat Discharge
  • Short Chimney – Flavor-Focused
  • UFORCE OCC Coil Technology
  • 0.6ohm P2 Single Mesh Coil – rated for 24-28W
  • 0.13ohm N1 Single Mesh Coil – rated for 50-100W
  • Convenient Sliding Top-Fill Method
  • Precision Triple Auxiliary Bottom Airflow Control
  • 14mm Resin Widebore Drip Tip – Vibrant Colorways
  • 24K Gold-Plated 510 Connection

About Voopoo

Voopoo is a Chinese-based company since its founding in 2017, the business has swiftly built a name for its ground-breaking products and cutting-edge technology. Voopoo is a well-known producer of premium vape device products and accessories by utilising cutting-edge chipsets, premium components, and outstanding design, Voopoo is dedicated to giving vapers the greatest experience vape possible. They are renowned for the outstanding performance, simplicity of use, and durability of their products. Voopoo offers a variety of additional vape device kits, including the Vinci, Argus, and Find series, in addition to their well-liked Drag series of gadgets. They also create a range of tanks, coils, and accessories that are made to function perfectly with their products.
